page.title: 14Primary School sports
page.content: In the winter the boys play football and the girls play netball. We all play rounders and do athletics in the summer. Swimming is done all the year round .We swim every Friday at Daventry but some people stay behind because they are ill. We play rounders in games time on Wednesday after our playtime and sometimes we also do athletics in games lessons. In swimming we do different stages and levels. A team has been to Derby and Duston for swimming galas.We have been to Long Buckby for athletic sports ,and badges can be won .At Football the boys won against Yelvertoft 3-1 ,but the girls lost at Netball 10-0. Yelvertoft beat us at football later 6-5.Each year we have a School Sports day.This year it is on 9th July.We have flat races, obstacle races and novelty races.
